pullrequest.title: Resolution option functionality for semi-supervised mode

content.raw: Another option since the data calculations are tightly coupled is to simply move it out of a function call altogether since it's only used once. This is more of a style call and I would assume @hoffman would prefer the function call to stay. The return variable name is irrelevant. The function name perhaps should be changed to something like 'get_downsampled_mode_and_presence`. I'm not certain. It's not pretty but it wouldn't ambiguous.
content.html: Another option since the data calculations are tightly coupled is to simply move it out of a function call altogether since it's only used once. This is more of a style call and I would assume @hoffman would prefer the function call to stay. The return variable name is irrelevant. The function name perhaps should be changed to something like 'get_downsampled_mode_and_presence`. I'm not certain. It's not pretty but it wouldn't ambiguous.
